section.title: Sat Sept 13, 2003
section.p: New web site layout, under the forrest-site CVS module! This site uses the XML Forrest project from xml.apache.org. It is much more comprehensive and faster than the old CMSimple.

section.title: Thu Sept 11, 2003
section.p: Simetron is now hosted at berliOS. Thank you to the berliOS team for making this possible. The workbench and the gtkgl-sharp CVS modules are now in berlioOS.
